textRoundConfig.q1: Mira found an abandoned rooftop in her apartment building and decided to grow flowers there. She had no gardening experience, and at first the plants barely survived the sun and wind. Every day, she carefully tended them, adjusting the soil and watering in small amounts. Slowly, the rooftop bloomed with colors, attracting birds and even the neighborsâ€™ attention. By the end of the season, Mira realized that her small, hidden effort had created a tiny oasis of beauty and happiness for herself and the community.
textRoundConfig.q1Ans: Write a story about a young woman named Mira who discovers an unused rooftop, experiments with gardening despite her inexperience, and gradually transforms it into a colorful space that brings happiness to herself and her neighbors
textRoundConfig.q2:
A QR-based self-billing system allows customers to scan products and generate bills themselves.
This reduces queue time and staff workload in retail shops.
The system supports digital payments without requiring POS machines.
It is cost-effective and suitable for small and medium businesses.
textRoundConfig.q2Ans: Describe a QR-based self-billing system in a 4-line paragraph, highlighting its benefits for small shops in simple language.
textRoundConfig.q3:
Short-interval polling is a communication method where a client repeatedly requests data from a server at fixed time intervals.
The server responds immediately whether new data is available or not.
This approach is easy to implement using standard HTTP requests.
However, frequent requests can increase server load and reduce efficiency.
textRoundConfig.q3Ans: Explain short-interval polling in a simple and technical tone, using a 4-line paragraph, and include one advantage and one disadvantage.
